text:
So with the new ones you need to “Start from scratch” > “Embeded HTML”
Then do the bare minimum to create a CTA e.g. text and link
Then you just style it up with your code / module settings
I add some help text to the CTA to guide people
Really helpfull. So for small cta's the new cta's are not directly an improvement. Although i do see the improvement for the more advanced cta's.

Yeah that’s how I see it, it would be really nice, if there was just a “Simple CTA” option in the new CTAs that was a nice big button when you first get there. 99% of the CTAs we use are just links that we style into buttons with our themes
